short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract a portion / section of a webpage into a PDF file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly extract a portion / section of a webpage into a PDF file or for printing.

Once the extension has been select you may hover over any element in the page and press on it to bring up a print dialog.

Icon (logo) created by Freepik, uploaded on Flaticon https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/download-pdf
